EmailTemplate.name: 09-28-22 DBNK Financial Brand Webinar Email 1.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Ask Anything [Live Studio Event]: Hard Truths About Digital Transformation
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Have a pressing digital transformation question? We have just the experience to get your tough questions answered. Join us on October 12 for a live studio event where all content will be driven by participant questions. Get your questions addressed, find out what’s top of mind for other financial institutions and hear from industry leaders who’ve been there—both from the fintech and financial institution sides. Please submit your question in advance during registration. Hard Truths About Digital Transformation Wednesday, October 12 at 2 p.m. EDT / 11 a.m. PDT Register and ask your question here <[[https://thefinancialbrand.com/banking-webinars/webinar-hard-truths-about-digital-transformation-ncr-webinar/]]> Joining live from the NCR studio to address your questions: - Tom Ormseth, EVP, Digital Channels & Transaction Banking, Wintrust Financial Corporation - Carrie Nelson, Executive Director, Professional Services, NCR - Erin Wynn, Director of Product Management, Digital Banking, NCR - Eric Brandt, Senior Market Analyst, Digital Banking, NCR We hope you'll join us! ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
